string.name: STR_BM_MSG_TEST
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot wear %0. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to unlock the function. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_BM_MSG_EQUIP_ITEM_RESTRICT_01
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot wear %0. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to unlock the function. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GET_EXP_BOOST_VITAL_BONUS
string.body: You have gained %num1 XP from %0 (Powerful Energy of Repose %num2).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GET_EXP_BOOST_VITAL_MAKEUP_BONUS
string.body: You have gained %num1 XP from %0 (Powerful Energy of Repose %num2, Energy of Salvation %num3).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_COMBAT_MU_EXP_GAIN_BOOST_VITAL_BONUS
string.body: You have gained %0 (Powerful Energy of Repose %num1).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_COMBAT_MU_EXP_GAIN_BOOST_VITAL_MAKEUP_BONUS
string.body: You have gained %0 (Powerful Energy of Repose %num1, Energy of Salvation %num2).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GET_EXP2_BOOST_VITAL_BONUS
string.body: You have gained %num0 XP (Powerful Energy of Repose %num1).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GET_EXP2_BOOST_VITAL_MAKEUP_BONUS
string.body: You have gained %num0 XP (Powerful Energy of Repose %num1, Energy of Salvation %num2).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EQUIP_ITEM_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot wear %0. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to unlock the function. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_COMBINE_ITEM_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot accept any more tasks. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to unlock the function. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_ITEM_DECOMPOSE_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can extract a maximum of %num0 items per week. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GATHER_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can gather a maximum of %num0 Essence per week. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to extract more. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GATHER_SKILL_LEVEL_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only gather items that require an Essencetapping Skill below %0 points. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXTRACT_GATHER_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can extract a maximum of %num0 Aether per week. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXTRACT_GATHER_SKILL_LEVEL_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only gather Vortices that require a Aethertapping Skill below %0 points. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_SELLGOLD_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only sell items equivalent to a maximum of %0 Kinah per day. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_VENDOR_SELL_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and have limited access to the Trade Broker functions. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_VENDOR_BUY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are [%bm_account_type] and have limited access to the Trade Broker functions. You can unlock these functions by purchasing certain shop items. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_LEVEL_UP_RESTRICT
string.body: You’re still a [%bm_account_type] and cannot reach a higher level than %0. Take a look at the shop, where you can find items that enable you to reach the next levels. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GUILD_CREATE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot create a legion. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to unlock this function. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GUILD_WAREHOUSE_USE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and not allowed to use the Legion Warehouse. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to unlock this function. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXCHANGE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot trade with other players. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to unlock the function. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXCHANGE_KINA_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot trade Kinah with other players. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to unlock the function. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXCHANGE_ITEM_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot trade items with other players. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to unlock the function. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_PERSONAL_SHOP_OPEN_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot open a private store. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_PERSONAL_SHOP_BUY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot access private stores. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_MAIL_WRITE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot send letters. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_MAIL_WRITE_WITH_ITEM_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot attach items or Kinah to a letter. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_MAIL_WRITE_ONLY_TO_FRIENDS
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only send a letter without items and Kinah attached to users who are on your friend list. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CHAT_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and only have limited chat possibilites. Purchase a Gold Pack to use the chat without limitations. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_SHOUT_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot shout. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to unlock this function. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_WHISPER_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only whisper to other players that are on your friend list. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_WHISPER_EXCEPT_FRIENDS_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only whisper to other players that are on your friend list. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CHANNEL_CHAT_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot join this chat's channel. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to unlock the function. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_VENDOR_VENDOR_USE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and have limited access to the Trade Broker functions. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_WAREHOUSE_USE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot access a private warehouse. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CHAR_SLOT_RESTRICT
string.body: You’re still [%bm_account_type] and cannot create any more characters. Take a look at the shop, where you can find items that enable you to create more characters. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_TRADEGOLD_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and allowed to trade a maximum of %0 Kinah per day. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_QUEST_ACQUIRE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot accept any more quests. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_PARTY_SEARCH_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot post messages for recruiting team members or for entering a group. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to remove the limitation. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_F2P_MSG_NOTICE_PACK_EXPIRE_TIME
string.body: The %1 effect will be over in %DURATIONTIME0.

string.name: STR_F2P_MSG_WARNING_PACK_EXPIRE_TIME
string.body: The %0 effect will be over in %DURATIONTIME0. You will be unable to use boosting effect or some game functions. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to unlock all functions. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_F2P_MSG_PACK_EXPIRED
string.body: The %0 effect will be over in %DURATIONTIME0. You will be unable to use boosting effect or some game functions. Purchase a Gold Pack in the shop to unlock all functions. [%shoplink]
